title: Activity-Based Forensic Science and Toxicology Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and legal terminology, foundational knowledge of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals emphasizing forensic science and toxicology case analysis applicable to real-world tasks, combining smartphone-based online modules and in-person workshops.

learning_goals: Ability to explain cause-of-death determination and toxic substance detection processes through forensic case analysis
Learners can simulate evidence collection and verification procedures based on toxic poisoning case studies
Learners demonstrate practical application skills by writing incident reports according to legal documentation standards

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
